sentences.en: As a result, Communist offensives are becoming less frequent.
sentences.cn: 这样, 共方只能减少其进攻的次数.

sentences.en: Communist anti - Japanese joint is great.
sentences.cn: 国共联合 抗日 是伟大的.

sentences.en: He was admitted as a member of the Communist Youth League.
He was captured and spent six years in a communist Vietnamese prison.
sentences.cn: 他被越共俘虏并被监禁六个月.

sentences.en: He was expelled from the Communist Youth League due to a blunder.
sentences.cn: 由于犯了重大错误,他被处以开除团籍的惩罚.

sentences.en: He was there when the split occurred in the Kuomintang - Communist alliance.
sentences.cn: 国共分裂时他正好在那里.

sentences.en: His political background includes membership in the Communist Youth League of China.

sentences.cn: 悲痛中的父母们已经无视官员的劝阻.

sentences.en: In grief, parents have overcome their usual caution about confronting Communist Party officials.
sentences.cn: 怀着悲痛的父母们不再对对抗征府心存谨慎.

sentences.en: Once she would have been spouting communist propaganda, now she was advertising low , low prices.
sentences.cn: 以前喇叭里可能是宣传, 现在却是卖低价的广告.

sentences.en: That area also houses the Communist Party committee building , which was almost gutted, Li said.
sentences.cn: 李说, 那是机要地区,县委驻地也在此处.

sentences.en: The communist government changed the name of city to Beijing again.

sentences.cn: 领导直属机关工会、共青团等群众组织,并指导其工作.

sentences.en: We are members of the Communist Youth League.
We swore under the league flag to be a good member of the Communist Youth League.
sentences.cn: 我们在团旗下发誓,做一名合格的共青团员.

sentences.en: Without the communists in France, the resistance might not have succeeded in World War II.
sentences.cn: 如果没有法国的共产主义者，二战中的抵抗运动可能不会成功。

sentences.en: Without the communists in France, the resistance might not have succeeded in World War II.
sentences.cn: 如果没有法国的共产主义者，二战中的抵抗运动可能不会成功。

words.tran_cn: 共产主义的；共产主义者的

phrases.tran_cn: 共产党宣言（现代共产主义学说发展史上的第一部经典，由马克思和恩格斯合著）

trans.tran_cn: 共产主义者，共产党党员
trans.tran_en: someone who is a member of a political party that supports communism, or who believes in communism
